title: Microfibre Cleaning Cloth, Pack of 10, Large Size: 40x40cm | Soft Premium Heavy Weight Washable Cloth Duster for Kitchen, Home, Bathrooms, Surfaces, Mirrors, Car, Motorbike - Care by Mail (Green)
features: SOFT CLEANING CLOTH: Our soft and absorbent microfibre cleaning cloths are ideal for use on various surfaces in Kitchens, Homes, Cars, Healthcare Institutions such as Care Homes, Nursing Homes, Schools, Offices and Commercial Spaces.
DESIGN: Made of 80% Polyester and 20% Polyamide our cleaning rags have a heavy weight of 220gsm allowing greater absorption of liquid without leaving lint or streaks behind.
SIZE: Our premium microfiber towels have a large size of 40cmx40cm, allowing them to make wiping larger surfaces easier
Available in 5 colours: BLUE, GREEN, YELLOW, ORANGE AND PINK to help prevent cross contamination and separate cleaning tasks such as general cleaning, restroom maintenance or kitchen surface use etc
Can be used to meet the everyday cleaning needs at home, offices, workplaces, schools, commercial spaces, healthcare settings such as hospitals, care homes, nursing homes.
